21.query: Fetch the last three post with the title and body field

28.query: Update the username to Zack for the user with id equal to 3
28.gold: mutation {  updateUserById(input : { id: 3, userPatch: { username: "Zack"}}) {    user {      id,      username    }  }}

actions: mutation {   updateUserById(input: {id: 3, userPatch: {username: "Zack"}}) {     user {       id       username     }   } }
observations: {'updateUserById': {'user': {'id': 3, 'username': 'Zack'}}}
